product_name: SmartWool Lightweight Front Range V-Neck Sweater - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Simple and versatile, the women's SmartWool Lightweight Front Range V-Neck Sweater is a top you'll look great in around town, and feel cozy in if you decide to head for the hills for a hike. 100% merino wool offers soft, naturally breathable comfort and lightweight warmth. Jersey-knit body features a ribbed V-neck collar and extended rib-knit cuffs. SmartWool Lightweight Front Range V-Neck Sweater is semi-formfitting. Closeout.
short_description: Simple and versatile, the women's SmartWool Lightweight Front Range V-Neck Sweater is a top you'll look great in around town, and feel cozy in if you decide to head for the hills for a hike.
